channel.title: CVE Feed for PI Websolution -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PI Websolution -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32575|2024-08-02T15:18:37.621Z -- pi%20websolution -- product%20page%20shipping%20calculator%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Product page shipping calculator for WooCommerce plugin <= 1.3.25 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-28991|2024-08-02T14:48:23.482Z -- pi%20websolution -- order%20date%2C%20order%20pickup%2C%20order%20date%20time%2C%20pickup%20location%2C%20delivery%20date%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Order date, Order pickup, Order date time, Pickup Location, delivery date for WooCommerce plugin <= 3.0.19 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-28988|2024-08-02T13:51:38.949Z -- pi%20websolution -- direct%20checkout%2C%20add%20to%20cart%20redirect%2C%20quick%20purchase%20button%2C%20buy%20now%20button%2C%20quick%20view%20button%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Direct checkout, Add to cart redirect, Quick purchase button, Buy now button, Quick View button for WooCommerce plugin <= 2.1.48 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-29094|2024-08-02T14:00:15.981Z -- pi%20websolution -- product%20page%20shipping%20calculator%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Product page shipping calculator for WooCommerce plugin <= 1.3.20 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-29093|2024-08-02T14:00:15.309Z -- pi%20websolution -- conditional%20cart%20fee
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PI Websolution Conditional cart fee plugin <= 1.0.96 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-29170|2024-08-02T14:00:15.961Z -- pi%20websolution -- product%20enquiry%20for%20woocommerce%2C%20woocommerce%20product%20catalog
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Product Enquiry for WooCommerce, WooCommerce product catalog plugin <= 2.2.12 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-29423|2024-08-02T14:07:46.112Z -- pi%20websolution -- cancel%20order%20request%20%2F%20return%20order%20%2F%20repeat%20order%20%2F%20reorder%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PI Websolution Cancel order request / Return order / Repeat Order / Reorder for WooCommerce plugin <= 1.3.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-34015|2024-08-02T15:54:14.175Z -- pi%20websolution -- conditional%20shipping%20%26%20advanced%20flat%20rate%20shipping%20rates%20%2F%20flexible%20shipping%20for%20woocommerce%20shipping
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in PI Websolution Conditional shipping & Advanced Flat rate shipping rates / Flexible shipping for WooCommerce shipping plugin <= 1.6.4.4 versions.
